name: Africa in the Postcolonial Era
description: Africa from the 1960s to the present. After independence, Africans experienced great optimism and then the disappointments of unmet expectations, development crises, conflict and AIDS. Yet the continentâ€™s strength is its youth. Topics include African socialism and capitalism; structural adjustment and resource economies; dictatorship and democratization; migration and urbanization; social movements.Same as HISB54H3
prerequisites: AFSA01H3 or AFSB51H3 or 0.5 credit in Modern History
